getEventsClassesTreeA: MATCH p=(ct:contract_type{guid:{guid}})<-[:has]-(:class)<-[:is]-(:class{type:'events'})-[:has]->(evt:events) WITH COLLECT(p) AS paths CALL org.digi.lg.convert.toTree(paths) YIELD value RETURN value
getEventsClassesTreeB: MATCH p=(ct:contract_type{guid:{guid}})<-[:has]-(:class)<-[:is]-(evt:class{type:'events'}) WITH COLLECT(p) AS paths CALL org.digi.lg.convert.toTree(paths) YIELD value RETURN value
